name: Club dVin Global Insider Membership
description: Think of a club dVIN membership NFT as your golden ticket into a world of unrivalled global experiences. Purchased in the form of a Non-Fungible Token (NFT), this unique digital asset unlocks the door to an invaluable community of wine lovers, collectors and investors. Gain access to some of the most exclusive wine offers and gastronomic events on the planet, and celebrate the heritage of wine as it enters a new era and takes its place in the metaverse.
